name: Train Station Edit
description:
It is a station game that you can play with ease by simply operating with free time!

【Characteristic】
· The day of the station to reproduce in real!
· Reproduce stations used by more than 100,000 people in a day with a lot of characters!
· Real system that time goes forward even if you end the application!
· Just chilling and you will be healed!
· Main story and a lot of fun sub events!

【Contents】
Make a new station and arrange the items so that many customers will come!
When customers use it, the number of customers increases steadily as the name recognition increases.
Let's decide the direction the station aims at and develop it to sightseeing spots and commercial areas as soon as you can afford it!

【story】
A former elite employee (you) who has been blown to this project from a major failure of work.
In this project it became the station manager, and at the same time with three station girls who were assigned as support
We had to deal with an esoteric mission of 500,000 people a day.
What is the past of the station manager ...
What is the truth of this project ...
